h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Jade Lotus Gourd Location
content: For even more guides and tips on finding all the Gourd customisation items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, Awaken Wine Worm locations, and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations.
